title: 08/05/2021 - HOUR 1 - Mahomes, Lakers, Rodgers
itunes:title: 08/05/2021 - HOUR 1 - Mahomes, Lakers, Rodgers
description:
Patrick Mahomes is good but he has yet to face crisis

Colin doubles down on the age of the Lakers roster

Aaron Rodgers latest comments on Packers GM Brian Gutekunst


Guest: LaVar Arrington
